title: Field Blood Transfusion Simulation-Based Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic emergency care knowledge and understanding of blood management systems
context.additional_context: Simulation training to enhance emergency response personnel competencies. Cultivating blood transfusion procedures and crisis management skills in realistic virtual environments

learning_goals: Achieve the ability to identify hemorrhagic shock patients and apply appropriate transfusion protocols in a simulation environment (evaluation criterion: perform procedures with over 85% accuracy).
Collaborate on selecting and administering blood products under time constraints (within 15 minutes) by forming virtual teams.
Apply immediate response algorithms for transfusion-related complications (target: 100% problem resolution rate per scenario).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
